thread.title: French Train Hero, stabbed 4 times in Ca.
thread.title_full: French Train Hero, stabbed 4 times in Ca.

author: roastpork
title: French Train Hero, stabbed 4 times in Ca.
text: French Train Hero, stabbed 4 times in Ca. Late night stabbing in Sacramento. That's terrible. I hope he is okay. Location: Canuckistan Posts: 15,299 This is front page on BBC this morning. A great lack of detail so far. All they say is "during an altercation". Location: Chicago Posts: 6,623 I always liked that song about "I need a hero", I'm not sure about the name, but a very catchy song. It looks like to might have been a typical bar fight but one never knows. Could have been payback, but IMO probably not. Still he was stabbed four times.
